results.content: I am very impressed by this course. He takes the time explain the concepts in a very relatable way, and he goes slow enough to make sure you understand. If you are a beginner using AngularDart this is definitely the course you should take! Thank you Paulo!
results.content_html: I am very impressed by this course. He takes the time explain the concepts in a very relatable way, and he goes slow enough to make sure you understand. If you are a beginner using AngularDart this is definitely the course you should take! Thank you Paulo!

results.content: The content of this course covers the basic of usage of Angular with Dart and my expectation was of a bit more advanced usage though I would say that it's a good intro to using Angular with Dart
results.content_html: The content of this course covers the basic of usage of Angular with Dart and my expectation was of a bit more advanced usage though I would say that it's a good intro to using Angular with Dart
